Comment: This should be OFF, otherwise beam is to gun spectrometer
The TMIT of this BPM will tell you if beam is on at screen/wire. Beware that the beam may flash on/off while doing a measurement.
Wire scanner 02, used for final IN20 emittance measurement
OTR2 camera, used for initial matching/emittance measurement
The TMIT of this BPM will tell you if beam is on all the way to the dump. That is, if quads are changing and there is beam here, likely it's empirical tuning on the FEL.
